name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer with 9+ years of experience specializing in building and deploying applications using **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **MySQL**. Proficient in developing seamless user interfaces with **React** and **MaterialUI** while leveraging microservices architecture and cloud services like **Google Cloud** and **Kubernetes**. Extensive knowledge of authentication mechanisms, including **Auth0**, **OAuth**, and **JWT**. Skilled in Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD) tools such as **GitLab CI** and **Jenkins**, ensuring high-quality software delivery. Expertise in testing frameworks like **Cypress** and **PyTest**, along with database migration management using **Alembic**. Committed to enhancing UX/UI and optimizing performance for B2B and SaaS applications. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to architect innovative solutions that meet stakeholder needs.

experience.responsibilities:
